page.title: 13LOCAL PAPERS IN SHIPSTON
page.content: The following local weekly newspapers publish news about the Shipston-on- Stour area: { Stratford upon Avon Herald}and {Midweek News, }both published in Stratford;{The Banbury Guardian }and {Banbury Cake, }published in Banbury, and {Cotswold Journal}from Evesham. Most of the people we interviewed read the Banbury Cake and Midweek News, probably because they are free. Here are the results: Banbury Cake 65%,Stratford upon Avon Herald 53%, Banbury Guardian 21%,Midweek News 84% Cotswold Journal 23%. Two{correspondents}live in Shipston- on-Stour,Mrs Broughton for the Stratford upon Avon Herald, and Mrs Hartwell for the Banbury Guardian. Both report such events as fetes, concerts,gymkhanas and meetings.
